name: MyGuava Business E-commerce Solution
author: Guavapay

sections.description:
MyGuava Business E-commerce Solution is your go-to solution for seamless online credit card processing in your WooCommerce store.

Key Features:

  • Effortless Integration: Easily integrate MyGuava Business E-commerce Solution’s secure and user-friendly payment gateway into your WooCommerce store.

  • Fast and Secure Transactions: Ensure lightning-fast, secure credit card transactions, enhancing your customers’ shopping experience.

  • Streamlined Payments: Simplify the payment process for your customers, making it easy for them to complete their purchases.

  • Enhanced Compatibility: Compatible with WooCommerce version 6.0 and above, guaranteeing smooth operation with the latest WooCommerce updates.

MyGuava Business E-commerce Solution empowers your online business with a reliable and efficient payment processing solution, ensuring that your customers’ transactions are quick, secure, and hassle-free.

Get started today and revolutionize your WooCommerce store with MyGuava Business E-commerce Solution!

External Service Integration

Our plugin integrates with MyGuava Business for payment processing. This integration is essential for facilitating secure payment transactions within the plugin.

Privacy and Data Use

For details on how MyGuava Business handles your data, please review Legal page.
sections.faq:
What is 3D Secure processing, and does this plugin support it?

3D Secure processing adds an additional layer of security for online credit card transactions. Yes, this plugin fully supports 3D Secure processing, ensuring secure and reliable transactions for your customers.

Which credit card types are supported by MyGuava Business E-commerce Solution?

Our plugin supports a wide range of credit card types, including Visa, Mastercard, UnionPay and more. Additionally, we also support popular digital wallet payment methods such as Apple Pay and Google Pay, providing your customers with convenient payment options.

Is UnionPay supported for international transactions?

Yes, UnionPay is supported for international transactions through the MyGuava Business E-commerce Solution. This allows you to cater to a global customer base and expand your business reach.

How can I get support for this plugin?

For any inquiries or support related to the MyGuava Business E-commerce Solution, please contact our dedicated support team at support@myguava.com.

Where can I find more information about MyGuava Business’s services and pricing?

You can visit our website at https://myguava.com to find comprehensive information about our services, pricing plans, and terms of use.

Does this plugin work with the latest version of WordPress?

Yes, this plugin is designed to work seamlessly with the latest version of WordPress. We regularly update and test it to ensure compatibility with WordPress updates.
sections.changelog:
1.0.9 – 07/08/24

  • Feature – Allowed webhook to accept refund statuses

1.0.8 – 25/07/24

  • Feature – Added payer information to the card entry page

1.0.7 – 29/03/24

  • Fix – Bug on subtotals block on payment page

1.0.6 – 08/03/24

  • Add – Subtotals block

1.0.5 – 29/02/24

  • Add – Screenshots

1.0.4 – 19/02/24

  • Add – Card binding functionality

1.0.3 – 02/01/24

  • Updated – Handling payment failed and cancelled orders with webhook

1.0.2 – 01/17/24

  • Updated – Added refund functionality and some improvements

1.0.1 – 12/25/23

  • Updated – Replaced files to support WooCommerce v8.3

1.0

  • Initial version
